summary: This is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated Saturday, August 10, 2019. It details officer post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses (sick, annual) for various units and posts within the facility. The document appears to be a routine internal staffing log.

persons.name: Noel, T
persons.context: Listed as an officer assigned to posts such as SHU 01. The document records shift changes and status updates for this officer.

persons.name: Thomas, M
persons.context: Listed as an officer whose status is frequently changed to 'Sick/Annual' leave on various posts including SHU #2 and INTERNAL.

connections.description: SJ is recorded as the person authorizing status changes (to Sick/Annual leave) for officer Thomas, M.
RW is recorded as the person authorizing multiple status changes (to Sick/Annual leave) for officer Thomas, M in early August.
MC is recorded as the person authorizing a shift change for officer Noel, T on August 9th.

events.title: MCC Staff Assignment Roster
events.description: Creation and ongoing updates to the daily staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: MCC New York New York, NY
keyFacts: This document is a routine internal staffing roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 10, 2019.
It details officer assignments to specific posts (e.g., SHU, CONTROL, LOBBY, ESCORT) and tracks shift changes, sick leave, and annual leave.
The roster shows a high frequency of status changes to 'Sick/Annual' leave for various officers, including Thomas, M.
The document was processed or saved on August 2, 2021, as indicated by the file timestamp.
No direct mention of Jeffrey Epstein, inmates, or case-related events is present in this staffing log.
